TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ItemChangedEventHandler(object sender, ItemChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ItemChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ItemChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void ItemChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ItemChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type ItemChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ItemChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de la clase .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
